tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for estimating well-calibrated uncertainty measures for gene expression predictions in single-cell spatial transcriptomics datasets. It enables uncertainty-aware downstream analyses.

tools.name: linguistic_calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Methods for aligning Language Models to express calibrated confidence
tools.detailed_description: A library/framework for aligning Large Language Models (LLMs) to produce calibrated verbal statements of confidence in their long-form generations, improving the reliability of model outputs.

tools.name: LTS
tools.one_line_profile: Local Temperature Scaling for Probability Calibration
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Local Temperature Scaling (LTS), a method for probability calibration of deep learning models, developed by the Biomedical Image Analysis Group at UNC.

tools.name: uncertainty-toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for predictive uncertainty quantification, calibration, and metrics
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python toolbox for predictive uncertainty quantification. It provides tools for calibration, metrics calculation, and visualization of uncertainty estimates for regression and classification models.

tools.name: pestpp
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable parameter estimation and uncertainty analysis tools from USGS
tools.detailed_description: A software suite for parameter estimation, uncertainty analysis, and sensitivity analysis, designed to be independent of the model being analyzed. Widely used in environmental and groundwater modeling.

tools.name: deep_uncertainty_estimation
tools.one_line_profile: General framework for uncertainty estimation in deep learning
tools.detailed_description: A framework and codebase implementing methods for estimating total uncertainty (aleatoric and epistemic) in deep learning models, particularly for robotics and perception tasks.

tools.name: pearsonify
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for classification intervals using conformal prediction
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight Python package designed to generate classification intervals for binary classification tasks. It utilizes Pearson residuals and conformal prediction techniques to provide calibrated uncertainty estimates.

tools.name: LibQPEP
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generalized quadratic pose estimation and uncertainty
tools.detailed_description: A C++/MATLAB library dedicated to solving generalized quadratic pose estimation problems. It includes functionality for describing related uncertainties, suitable for robotics and computer vision research.

tools.name: classifier-calibration
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for classifier calibration and reliability diagrams
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit providing implementations for reliability diagrams, Platt's scaling, and isotonic regression, designed to evaluate and improve the calibration of probability predictions from classifiers.

tools.name: VeriGauge
tools.one_line_profile: A united toolbox for running major robustness verification approaches for Deep Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: VeriGauge is a comprehensive toolbox designed for the robustness verification of Deep Neural Networks (DNNs). It integrates various state-of-the-art verification methods, allowing researchers to evaluate and compare the robustness of DNNs against adversarial perturbations and other uncertainties.

tools.name: Advertorch
tools.one_line_profile: A toolbox for adversarial robustness research in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: Advertorch is a Python toolbox for adversarial robustness research, specifically designed for PyTorch. It provides implementations of various adversarial attacks, defenses, and robust training methods, enabling researchers to evaluate and improve the resilience of machine learning models.

tools.name: Robust Statistical Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for robust statistical analyses
tools.detailed_description: The Robust Statistical Toolbox is a collection of MATLAB functions designed to perform robust statistical analyses. It includes methods for robust correlation, regression, and other statistical tests that are resistant to outliers and violations of parametric assumptions, suitable for scientific data analysis.

tools.name: DeepRobust
tools.one_line_profile: A PyTorch adversarial library for attack and defense methods on images and graphs
tools.detailed_description: DeepRobust is a comprehensive PyTorch library for adversarial attacks and defenses, covering both image and graph data. It provides a unified platform for researchers to simulate attacks, evaluate model robustness, and develop defense mechanisms against adversarial examples.

tools.name: DataShifts
tools.one_line_profile: Library for quantifying and analyzing distribution shifts in data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to quantify and analyze distribution shifts (covariate shift, prior probability shift, and concept shift) in machine learning datasets, helping to diagnose model performance degradation.

tools.name: Evidently
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation library for Evidence Accumulation Models in cognitive science
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for simulating Evidence Accumulation Models (EAMs), which are used in cognitive science and psychology to model decision-making processes and reaction times.

tools.name: Adaptive Alerting
tools.one_line_profile: Anomaly detection system for streaming time series
tools.detailed_description: A library for performing anomaly detection on streaming time series data, featuring automated model selection to adapt to changing data patterns, suitable for monitoring scientific or industrial sensor data.

tools.name: PeakPickingTools
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB toolbox for modal parameter extraction
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox designed to extract modal parameters from frequency response functions using a robust peak-picking identification technique, applicable in structural dynamics and signal processing.

tools.name: PolaronMobility.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Feynman's variational path-integral model for Fröhlich polarons
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package that implements Feynman's variational path-integral model to calculate temperature-dependent polaron mobilities and other observables in materials science physics.

tools.name: Robustar
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive toolbox for robust vision classification
tools.detailed_description: An interactive toolbox designed to improve the robustness of vision classification models through data augmentation and adversarial training, facilitating the creation of robust AI models.

tools.name: URET
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Robustness Evaluation Toolkit for NLP
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by IBM for evaluating the robustness of Natural Language Processing (NLP) models against evasion attacks, supporting various attack methods and metrics.

tools.name: HEART Library
tools.one_line_profile: Hardened Extension of the Adversarial Robustness Toolbox
tools.detailed_description: An extension of the Adversarial Robustness Toolbox (ART) designed to support the assessment of adversarial AI vulnerabilities in Test & Evaluation workflows, providing hardened implementations for practical deployment.

tools.name: Frouros
tools.one_line_profile: Library for drift detection in machine learning systems
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python library dedicated to drift detection in machine learning systems, providing implementations of various concept drift and data drift detection algorithms.

tools.name: fd-shifts
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and toolkit for failure detection under distribution shifts
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark and toolkit for evaluating failure detection methods under distribution shifts in image classification, specifically focused on biomedical imaging applications.

tools.name: 2DMatGMM
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for detection and classification of 2D material flakes
tools.detailed_description: An open-source robust machine learning platform designed for the real-time detection and classification of 2D material flakes from optical microscopy images.

tools.name: OpenOOD
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive benchmarking codebase for generalized Out-of-Distribution (OOD) detection
tools.detailed_description: OpenOOD provides a unified and standardized benchmark for Generalized Out-of-Distribution (OOD) detection, covering various OOD detection methods, datasets, and evaluation metrics to facilitate fair comparison and research.

tools.name: CellDrift
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for inferring temporal perturbation effects in single-cell data
tools.detailed_description: CellDrift is a Python tool designed to evaluate the effects of temporal perturbations on single-cell data, helping to identify and analyze drift or changes in cell states over time.

tools.name: robust-elm-irls
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Regularized Extreme Learning Machine for regression
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of Robust Regularized Extreme Learning Machine (ELM) using Iteratively Reweighted Least Squares (IRLS) to provide robust regression capabilities in the presence of outliers.

tools.name: Decorrelated-Weighted-Regression
tools.one_line_profile: Stable prediction algorithm for model misspecification and distribution shift
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Decorrelated Weighted Regression (DWR) designed to achieve stable predictions and handle agnostic distribution shifts and model misspecification.

tools.name: kramersmoyal
tools.one_line_profile: Library for calculating Kramers-Moyal coefficients from stochastic data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to compute Kramers-Moyal coefficients for stochastic data of any dimension and to any desired order, useful for analyzing stochastic processes and drift-diffusion dynamics.

tools.name: SDDObench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Streaming Data-Driven Optimization with Concept Drift
tools.detailed_description: SDDObench is a benchmark suite designed for evaluating algorithms in the context of Streaming Data-Driven Optimization (SDDO), specifically focusing on scenarios involving concept drift.

tools.name: Eurybia
tools.one_line_profile: Library for monitoring model drift and data validation
tools.detailed_description: Eurybia is a Python library designed to monitor machine learning model drift over time and ensure model deployment security through data validation and consistency checks.

tools.name: CIFAR-10 Challenge
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for evaluating adversarial robustness on CIFAR-10
tools.detailed_description: A challenge framework and codebase provided by MadryLab to explore and benchmark the adversarial robustness of neural networks specifically on the CIFAR-10 dataset.

tools.name: MNIST Challenge
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for evaluating adversarial robustness on MNIST
tools.detailed_description: A challenge framework and codebase provided by MadryLab to explore and benchmark the adversarial robustness of neural networks specifically on the MNIST dataset.

tools.name: robustness
tools.one_line_profile: Library for training and evaluating neural networks with adversarial robustness
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library developed by MadryLab for experimenting with, training, and evaluating neural networks, with a primary focus on adversarial robustness and robust optimization.

tools.name: T2N

tools.detailed_description: T2N is a toolbox that provides an interface between MATLAB and the NEURON simulation environment, facilitating robust electrophysiological modeling and compartmental modeling of neurons.

tools.name: drifter
tools.one_line_profile: R library for concept drift and shift detection in predictive models
tools.detailed_description: Drifter is an R package designed to identify and visualize concept drift and concept shift in predictive models, helping to maintain model performance over time.

tools.detailed_description: NannyML is a Python library for post-deployment monitoring of machine learning models. It estimates model performance without ground truth and detects data drift to ensure reliability in production.

tools.name: CanarySEFI

tools.detailed_description: CanarySEFI is a comprehensive framework for evaluating the robustness of deep learning-based image recognition models, incorporating various attack and defense algorithms and evaluation metrics.

tools.name: OODRobustBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for adversarial robustness under distribution shift
tools.detailed_description: OODRobustBench is a benchmark suite designed to analyze and evaluate the adversarial robustness of machine learning models specifically under conditions of distribution shift.

tools.name: PkBoost

tools.name: RobustBench

tools.detailed_description: A benchmark unifying unsupervised graph-level out-of-distribution (OOD) detection and anomaly detection, facilitating the evaluation of methods on graph data.

tools.detailed_description: Code implementation for improving adversarial robustness through self-supervised pre-training followed by fine-tuning, as presented in CVPR 2020.

tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB toolbox for ordinal-patterns-based analysis, including permutation entropy, robust permutation entropy, and conditional entropy, useful for time series analysis.

tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed for the healthcare domain to evaluate and monitor AI models, specifically addressing drift and robustness in clinical settings.

tools.name: anomaly_detection_bootstrapping

tools.detailed_description: A software system applying bootstrapped statistical workflows to identify and quantify data abnormalities, such as measurement errors and out-of-distribution samples in large datasets.

tools.name: Defect-GLM

tools.detailed_description: A large visual-language model specifically designed for monitoring and detecting defects in industrial settings, serving as a specialized tool for robust visual inspection.

tools.detailed_description: Massive Online Analysis (MOA) is a framework for data stream mining, including a collection of machine learning algorithms for classification, regression, clustering, and specifically concept drift detection.

tools.detailed_description: A Python library for building scorecard models, commonly used in credit scoring. It implements statistical methods like Weight of Evidence (WoE) and Information Value (IV) for feature engineering and logistic regression for modeling, providing interpretable risk models.

tools.name: LLM Prompt Testing
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for testing LLM prompts with Responsible AI metrics
tools.detailed_description: A testing framework specifically for Large Language Models (LLMs) that computes NLP and Responsible AI metrics for model-generated answers. It helps in auditing and evaluating the safety and quality of LLM outputs.

tools.name: MultiCorrupt
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for robust multi-modal 3D object detection
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark toolkit for evaluating the robustness of LiDAR-Camera fusion models in autonomous driving. It simulates diverse corruption types (e.g., misalignment, weather) to assess model performance under challenging conditions.

tools.name: ModelNet40-C
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset and toolkit for 3D point cloud robustness against common corruptions
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed to evaluate the robustness of 3D point cloud recognition models. It provides a set of common corruptions (e.g., noise, density changes) and tools to generate these corrupted datasets for rigorous model testing.

tools.name: ModelNet-C
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking toolkit for analyzing point cloud classification under corruptions
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark for evaluating the robustness of point cloud classification models. It includes generated corrupted data variants and evaluation scripts to analyze model performance under various noise and distortion conditions.

tools.name: MobileSafetyBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for evaluating safety of autonomous agents in mobile device control
tools.detailed_description: A safety evaluation benchmark specifically designed for autonomous agents operating in mobile environments. It provides scenarios and metrics to assess agent behavior and alignment with safety constraints.

tools.name: LiDAR-Camera Robust Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit to convert clean LiDAR-camera datasets into robustness benchmarks
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit designed to generate robust benchmark datasets from clean LiDAR-camera data. It simulates various corruption scenarios to facilitate the evaluation of multi-modal perception models' robustness.

tools.name: fairness
tools.one_line_profile: R package for computing and visualizing fair ML metrics
tools.detailed_description: An R library dedicated to calculating, visualizing, and comparing various fairness metrics for machine learning models. It supports multiple definitions of fairness to aid in algorithmic auditing.

tools.name: PointCloud-C
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking toolkit for point cloud perception robustness
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit and benchmark for analyzing the robustness of point cloud perception models against various corruptions. It includes code for generating corrupted data and evaluating model performance.

tools.name: RobustMVD
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for robust multi-view depth estimation
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating multi-view depth estimation models under robust conditions. It provides datasets and evaluation protocols to test model stability and accuracy.

tools.name: convex_adversarial
tools.one_line_profile: Library for training neural networks with provable adversarial robustness
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that implements methods for training neural networks that are provably robust to adversarial attacks, utilizing convex relaxation techniques.

tools.name: smoothing
tools.one_line_profile: Code for randomized smoothing to achieve certified adversarial robustness
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of randomized smoothing techniques to provide certified adversarial robustness for deep learning models at ImageNet scale.

tools.name: test-time-adaptation
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark and library for online test-time adaptation methods
tools.detailed_description: A repository providing implementations and benchmarks for various online test-time adaptation (TTA) algorithms, allowing for the evaluation of model robustness and adaptation capabilities under distribution shifts.

tools.name: Square Attack
tools.one_line_profile: Query-efficient black-box adversarial attack implementation
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Square Attack, a score-based black-box adversarial attack that does not rely on local gradient information, used for evaluating the robustness of image classifiers.

tools.name: FairBench
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive framework for AI fairness exploration and benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed to facilitate the exploration and evaluation of fairness in AI models, providing various metrics and tools to assess bias.

tools.name: BIPIA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for indirect prompt injection attacks on LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset and evaluation framework for assessing the robustness of Large Language Models (LLMs) and their defenses against indirect prompt injection attacks.

tools.name: AI Agent Evals
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation tool for AI agent applications
tools.detailed_description: A tool (often used as a GitHub Action) to evaluate AI agent applications using model-as-a-judge techniques, focusing on content safety and mathematical metrics.

tools.name: PromptBench
tools.one_line_profile: Unified evaluation framework for large language models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive framework for evaluating Large Language Models (LLMs) across various tasks, including robustness against adversarial prompts and other safety concerns.

tools.name: GenBit
tools.one_line_profile: Gender bias identification tool for text
tools.detailed_description: A library within the Responsible AI Toolbox focused on measuring and identifying gender bias in text corpora and model outputs.

tools.name: Responsible AI Mitigations
tools.one_line_profile: Library for implementing Responsible AI mitigations
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to help practitioners implement mitigation strategies for data and model issues identified during responsible AI assessment.

tools.name: Responsible AI Privacy
tools.one_line_profile: Privacy estimation library using membership inference attacks
tools.detailed_description: A library for statistically estimating the privacy risks of machine learning pipelines, specifically focusing on resistance to membership inference attacks.

tools.name: Responsible AI Tracker
tools.one_line_profile: JupyterLab extension for tracking RAI experiments
tools.detailed_description: A tool for tracking, managing, and comparing Responsible AI mitigations and experiments within JupyterLab, facilitating audit trails and reproducibility.

tools.name: AudioMarkBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for audio watermarking robustness
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and codebase for benchmarking the robustness of audio watermarking techniques against various attacks and perturbations.

tools.name: FortisAVQA
tools.one_line_profile: Robustness evaluation and bias mitigation for AVQA
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for evaluating robustness and mitigating bias in Audio-Visual Question Answering (AVQA) models.

tools.name: MAITE
tools.one_line_profile: Modular AI Trustworthy Engineering library
tools.detailed_description: A library of common types, protocols, and utilities designed to support AI test and evaluation workflows, developed by MIT Lincoln Laboratory.

tools.name: Agentic Security
tools.one_line_profile: Agentic LLM vulnerability scanner and red teaming kit
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to scan for vulnerabilities in LLM agents and perform red teaming operations to assess security and safety risks.

tools.name: fairensics
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for discovering and mitigating biases in machine learning models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to help researchers and practitioners discover and mitigate biases in machine learning models and datasets. It provides implementations of various fairness metrics and mitigation algorithms.

tools.name: GenAIEval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for Generative AI performance and safety
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive evaluation framework, benchmark, and scorecard for Generative AI models. It targets performance metrics like throughput and latency, as well as accuracy, safety, and hallucination detection.

tools.name: huggingface_ding
tools.one_line_profile: Utility for integrating DI-engine RL models with Hugging Face
tools.detailed_description: Auxiliary tools for pulling and loading reinforcement learning models based on DI-engine from the Hugging Face Hub, and pushing them with auto-created model cards. Facilitates the management and sharing of scientific RL models.

tools.name: ethosai
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for automating AI testing and ensuring model trustworthiness
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to automate the testing of AI models to ensure their trustworthiness. It likely provides interfaces for evaluating model performance, fairness, and robustness.

tools.name: openpilot_in_carla
tools.one_line_profile: Integration of Openpilot with Carla simulator for safety evaluation
tools.detailed_description: Provides configuration and tools to integrate the Openpilot autonomous driving stack with the Carla simulator. This setup is specifically designed for safety evaluation using almost-safe set based methods and includes radar input enhancements.

tools.name: visual-auditor
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive tool for auditing model biases and vulnerabilities
tools.detailed_description: An interactive tool for scalable auditing of machine learning model biases and vulnerabilities. It provides interpretable mitigation strategies and visualization to help researchers understand model behavior.

tools.name: REVISE
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for measuring and mitigating bias in visual datasets
tools.detailed_description: REVISE (REvealing VIsual biaSEs) is a tool designed to measure and mitigate biases in visual datasets. It helps researchers identify potential issues in data distribution and representation before model training.

tools.name: promptfoo
tools.one_line_profile: CLI tool for evaluating and red-teaming LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool for testing, evaluating, and red-teaming Large Language Models (LLMs). It allows users to compare performance across different models (GPT, Claude, Llama, etc.), scan for vulnerabilities, and ensure safety and accuracy in LLM applications.

tools.name: audit-ai
tools.one_line_profile: Library for detecting demographic bias in ML models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to detect demographic differences and biases in the output of machine learning models or other assessments. It provides statistical tests to evaluate fairness.

tools.name: MAGICAL
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for robust imitation learning
tools.detailed_description: The MAGICAL benchmark suite is designed to evaluate the robustness of imitation learning algorithms. It provides a set of tasks and environments to test how well agents generalize to variations in the environment.

tools.name: AuditNLG
tools.one_line_profile: Library for auditing and evaluating the trustworthiness of generative AI language models
tools.detailed_description: AuditNLG is a Python library developed by Salesforce for auditing Generative AI language models. It provides tools to measure and evaluate trustworthiness, safety, and fairness in text generation, helping researchers identify biases and risks in NLG systems.

tools.name: Fair-PCA
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Fair PCA algorithm for dimensionality reduction with fairness constraints
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the MATLAB implementation of the Fair PCA algorithm. It provides a method for performing Principal Component Analysis while satisfying fairness constraints, ensuring that the dimensionality reduction process does not disproportionately disadvantage specific subgroups.

tools.name: OpenAgentSafety
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for evaluating the safety of AI agents in realistic environments
tools.detailed_description: OpenAgentSafety is a framework designed to evaluate the safety of AI agents. It provides realistic environments and scenarios to test agents for potential safety risks, ensuring they operate reliably and ethically in complex settings.

tools.name: scabench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for evaluating AI audit agents using real-world data
tools.detailed_description: SCABench is a framework for evaluating AI audit agents. It utilizes recent real-world data to benchmark the performance of agents designed to audit other AI systems, focusing on their ability to detect vulnerabilities or compliance issues.

tools.name: frai
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for responsible AI auditing, reporting, and risk assessment
tools.detailed_description: frai is an open-source toolkit for responsible AI that includes a CLI and SDK. It helps developers scan code, collect evidence, and generate model cards and risk files, facilitating the auditing and documentation process for AI models.

tools.name: ChemBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark datasets and tools for molecular machine learning
tools.detailed_description: ChemBench provides benchmark datasets (MoleculeNet) and tools (MolMapNet) for evaluating machine learning models in chemistry. It serves as a standard resource for testing molecular property prediction and structure analysis algorithms.

tools.name: SIUO
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-modality safety alignment framework for multimodal models
tools.detailed_description: SIUO is a framework for Cross-Modality Safety Alignment, designed to improve the safety and robustness of multimodal AI models. It addresses challenges in aligning vision and language modalities to prevent harmful outputs.

tools.name: ASTRA-RL
tools.one_line_profile: Adaptive Stress Testing for Robust AI toolbox
tools.detailed_description: ASTRA-RL (Adaptive Stress Testing for Robust AI) is a toolbox for stress testing AI systems. It uses reinforcement learning to find failure modes and improve the robustness of AI models through adversarial training and adaptive testing scenarios.

tools.name: NoW Evaluation
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation toolkit for 3D face reconstruction on the NoW benchmark
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains the official evaluation scripts for the NoW Benchmark Dataset. It provides metrics to measure the accuracy and robustness of 3D face reconstruction methods from single images under varying conditions.

tools.name: VERITE
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for multimodal misinformation detection accounting for unimodal bias
tools.detailed_description: VERITE is a robust benchmark designed for evaluating multimodal misinformation detection models. It specifically accounts for unimodal bias to ensure that models are truly leveraging multimodal information for verification.

tools.name: LLaMA-MiLe-Loss
tools.one_line_profile: Loss function implementation for mitigating learning difficulty bias in LLMs
tools.detailed_description: This repository implements the MiLe (Mitigating Learning difficulty) Loss, a method designed to reduce bias in generative language models by accounting for the difficulty of learning different samples. It serves as a tool for improving model fairness and alignment.

tools.name: NVIDIA Quantum Hybrid
tools.one_line_profile: Prototype hybrid classical-quantum workflow with safety policy gates
tools.detailed_description: This project provides a prototype workflow for hybrid classical-quantum computing. It includes policy gates for AI safety and security, supports Qiskit backends, and emits audit logs, serving as a template for secure quantum-classical integrations.

tools.name: PhiSat-2 Trustworthy AI
tools.one_line_profile: Trustworthy onboard AI framework for satellite earth observation
tools.detailed_description: This repository contains code for trustworthy onboard AI for the PhiSat-2 satellite mission. It includes tools for model calibration, telemetry, and execution in constrained environments (ONNX/INT8), specifically for Earth Observation tasks.

tools.name: LIBERO-plus
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for robustness analysis of vision-language-action models
tools.detailed_description: LIBERO-plus is a generalized benchmark designed for in-depth robustness analysis of vision-language-action models in robotics. It provides environments and metrics to evaluate how well agents generalize and handle perturbations.

tools.name: FairLens
tools.one_line_profile: Library for identifying bias and measuring fairness in data
tools.detailed_description: FairLens is an open-source Python library used to identify bias and measure fairness in datasets. It provides statistical metrics and visualization tools to help data scientists understand and mitigate biases before model training.

tools.name: Re-Align
tools.one_line_profile: Alignment framework to mitigate hallucinations in Vision Language Models
tools.detailed_description: Re-Align is a framework that leverages image retrieval to mitigate hallucinations in Vision Language Models (VLMs). It aligns model outputs with retrieved visual evidence to improve factual accuracy and trustworthiness.

tools.name: rGAN
tools.one_line_profile: Label-Noise Robust Generative Adversarial Networks implementation
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of rGAN (Label-Noise Robust Generative Adversarial Networks), designed to learn clean data distributions from noisy training data in generative modeling tasks.

tools.name: Fairness Indicators
tools.one_line_profile: Fairness evaluation and visualization toolkit for TensorFlow models
tools.detailed_description: A library that enables easy computation of commonly-identified fairness metrics for binary and multiclass classifiers, allowing researchers to evaluate model performance across different user slices.

tools.name: Model Card Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for automating model card generation
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit that streamlines and automates the generation of Model Cards, which are documents that provide context and transparency into a machine learning model's development and performance.

tools.name: AISafetyLab
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive framework for AI safety attack, defense, and evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A framework covering safety attack, defense, and evaluation for AI models, providing a collection of methods to assess and improve model robustness.

tools.name: cotk
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for fast development and fair evaluation of text generation
tools.detailed_description: Conversational Toolkit (cotk) is an open-source toolkit designed for fast development and fair evaluation of text generation models, providing standard metrics and datasets.

tools.name: 3D_Corruptions_AD
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for 3D object detection robustness in autonomous driving
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating the robustness of 3D object detection models against common corruptions in autonomous driving scenarios.

tools.name: MMTrustEval
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for benchmarking trustworthiness of multimodal LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox designed for benchmarking the trustworthiness of multimodal large language models, covering various safety and reliability dimensions.

tools.name: STAIR
tools.one_line_profile: Safety alignment with introspective reasoning
tools.detailed_description: Codebase for 'STAIR: Improving Safety Alignment with Introspective Reasoning', providing methods to align language models for safety using introspective reasoning techniques.

tools.name: ARES
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for adversarial machine learning and robustness benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A Python library focused on adversarial machine learning, specifically for benchmarking adversarial robustness of models against various attacks.

tools.name: Tiger
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for building trustworthy LLM applications
tools.detailed_description: An open-source LLM toolkit that includes modules for AI safety (TigerArmor), RAG (TigerRAG), and fine-tuning (TigerTune) to build trustworthy applications.

tools.name: Fast Adversarial Training
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of fast adversarial training methods
tools.detailed_description: Code for 'Understanding and Improving Fast Adversarial Training', providing implementations for efficient adversarial training to improve model robustness.

tools.name: Image Crop Analysis
tools.one_line_profile: Code for analyzing fairness metrics in image cropping
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing code and metrics for analyzing fairness and representation in image cropping algorithms, specifically focusing on Twitter's saliency algorithm.

tools.name: Armory
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial robustness evaluation test bed
tools.detailed_description: A container-based test bed for evaluating the adversarial robustness of machine learning models against various attacks and scenarios.

tools.name: Metric-Fairness
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis of social bias in language model-based metrics
tools.detailed_description: Code for analyzing social bias in language model-based metrics (like BERTScore) for text generation, providing tools to assess metric fairness.

tools.name: CarDreamer
tools.one_line_profile: World model based autonomous driving platform
tools.detailed_description: A world model-based autonomous driving platform implemented in CARLA, enabling simulation and training of autonomous driving agents.

tools.name: WAVES
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for image watermark robustness
tools.detailed_description: Code for benchmarking the robustness of image watermarks against various attacks and distortions.

tools.name: Balanced-Datasets-Are-Not-Enough
tools.one_line_profile: Gender bias estimation and mitigation in deep image representations
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of methods to estimate and mitigate gender bias in deep image representations, going beyond simple dataset balancing.

tools.name: Double-Hard-Debias
tools.one_line_profile: Word embedding gender bias mitigation tool
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Double-Hard Debias, a method for tailoring word embeddings to mitigate gender bias.

tools.name: MagnetLoss-PyTorch
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Magnet Loss for deep metric learning
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Magnet Loss, a deep metric learning technique used for learning embeddings where local structure is preserved.

tools.name: SDN
tools.one_line_profile: Scene bias mitigation in action recognition
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a method to mitigate scene bias in action recognition models, improving generalization to unseen environments.

tools.name: Trojan-Activation-Attack
tools.one_line_profile: Trojan activation attack for LLM safety alignment
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Trojan Activation Attack, a method to attack Large Language Models using activation steering to test safety alignment.

tools.name: RoboBEV
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for BEV perception robustness in autonomous driving
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark for evaluating and improving the robustness of Bird's Eye View (BEV) perception models in autonomous driving scenarios.

tools.name: Adversarial_Long-Tail
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial robustness under long-tailed distribution
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of methods for improving adversarial robustness in models trained on long-tailed distributions.

tools.name: Structural Crack Detection
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for structural crack detection and classification
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for automated visual inspection in aircraft maintenance, specifically for detecting and classifying structural cracks.

tools.name: BETA
tools.one_line_profile: Method for mitigating confirmation bias in domain adaptation of black-box predictors
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the 'Divide to Adapt' approach to mitigate confirmation bias during the domain adaptation process for black-box predictors, enhancing model reliability.

tools.name: semisup-adv
tools.one_line_profile: Semi-supervised learning framework for improving adversarial robustness
tools.detailed_description: Code implementation for using semi-supervised learning techniques to enhance the adversarial robustness of machine learning models, as presented in NeurIPS 2019.

tools.name: MLLM_safety_study
tools.one_line_profile: Safety alignment framework for multi-modal large language models
tools.detailed_description: Official code for a CVPR 2025 paper investigating the necessity of curated malicious data for safety alignment in multi-modal large language models (MLLMs).

tools.name: Robustness-Aware-Pruning-ADMM

tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a robustness-aware pruning method using ADMM (Alternating Direction Method of Multipliers) to achieve both model compression and adversarial robustness.

tools.name: pytorch-adversarial-training
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of adversarial training for robust classification
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation for adversarial training on datasets like MNIST and CIFAR-10, including visualization tools for robustness classifiers.

tools.name: bursting-burden
tools.one_line_profile: Assessment tool for counterfactual-based fairness metrics
tools.detailed_description: Code accompanying a paper that assesses the 'Burden' metric, a counterfactual-based fairness metric, providing tools to evaluate algorithmic fairness.

tools.name: fairml-farm
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of fair machine learning algorithm implementations
tools.detailed_description: A library providing implementations of various fair machine learning algorithms to facilitate research and application of fairness in AI.

tools.name: VLGuard
tools.one_line_profile: Safety fine-tuning baseline for Vision Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of VLGuard, a method for safety fine-tuning of Vision Large Language Models (VLLMs) with minimal cost, as presented at ICML 2024.

tools.name: MT-Consistency
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for evaluating and mitigating acquiescence bias in LLMs
tools.detailed_description: A repository investigating LLMs' tendency to exhibit acquiescence bias in sequential QA interactions, including evaluation methods, datasets, and mitigation code.

tools.name: RoDLA
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for robustness of document layout analysis models
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool designed to evaluate the robustness of Document Layout Analysis (DLA) models against various perturbations.

tools.name: MTSA
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-turn safety alignment for LLMs via multi-round red-teaming
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of MTSA, a method for aligning Large Language Models for safety through multi-round red-teaming interactions.

tools.name: CPP
tools.one_line_profile: Depth prediction improvement by mitigating pose distribution bias
tools.detailed_description: Code for the CVPR 2021 paper 'Camera Pose Matters', providing methods to improve depth prediction by mitigating pose distribution bias.

tools.name: EDITS
tools.one_line_profile: Modeling and mitigating data bias for Graph Neural Networks
tools.detailed_description: Open source code for the paper 'EDITS', focusing on modeling and mitigating data bias in Graph Neural Networks (GNNs).

tools.name: PyGDebias
tools.one_line_profile: Library for fairness-aware graph mining algorithms
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library providing graph datasets and implementations of fairness-aware graph mining algorithms (PyGDebias).

tools.name: What-If-Explainability
tools.one_line_profile: Explainability tool for LightGBM using FastTreeShap and What-If Tool
tools.detailed_description: A notebook-based tool demonstrating how to explain LightGBM tree models using FastTreeShap (Shapley values) and Google's What-If Tool.

tools.name: dps-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for diffusion posterior sampling in Bayesian inverse problems
tools.detailed_description: A framework for fair and objective benchmarking of diffusion posterior sampling algorithms applied to Bayesian inverse problems.

tools.name: AIM-Fair
tools.one_line_profile: Algorithmic fairness via selective fine-tuning with synthetic data
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of AIM-Fair, a method to advance algorithmic fairness by selectively fine-tuning biased models using contextual synthetic data.

tools.name: Debiased-Chat
tools.one_line_profile: Gender bias mitigation for neural dialogue generation
tools.detailed_description: PyTorch implementation of adversarial learning techniques to mitigate gender bias in neural dialogue generation models.

tools.name: DebiAN
tools.one_line_profile: Unknown bias discovery and mitigation network
tools.detailed_description: Official code for 'Discover and Mitigate Unknown Biases with Debiasing Alternate Networks', providing a framework to handle unknown biases in models.

tools.name: PE-RLHF
tools.one_line_profile: Safe autonomous driving via RLHF and physics knowledge
tools.detailed_description: Code for 'Trustworthy Human-AI Collaboration', integrating Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback (RLHF) and physics knowledge for safe autonomous driving.

tools.name: terrain_benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Robustness benchmark for legged locomotion on terrains
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite for evaluating the robustness of legged locomotion control policies across various terrain types.

tools.name: AdvTrajectoryPrediction
tools.one_line_profile: Adversarial robustness evaluation for trajectory prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of methods to evaluate and improve the adversarial robustness of trajectory prediction models for autonomous vehicles.
